name: Inkably
slogan: We help people get better tattoos
description: Inkably is on a mission to make it easy for people to find and book the right tattoo artist. We aim to inspire and inform, provide support to both the clients and the artists, make the whole process of researching and getting a tattoo as simple and fast and reliable as possible, but most importantly, make sure everyone gets the best tattoo possible.

jobs.title: Content Creator - Must Love Tattoos
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Looking for a tattoo-loving person to create, manage and grow our content. As you can imagine, we are all about tattoos, so the right candidate will be expected to know a little bit about the industry, but most of all we are looking for someone who is creative and passionate about tattoos and the lifestyle.

Not a paid position initially, can become a paid job if the candidate can deliver and impress.

Responsibilities:

  • Create written and visual content for our website and social media;
  • Curate tattoo artist's portfolios;
  • Go on paid assignments to tattoo conventions, events;
  • Create relationships (shmooze) with people from the industry
